nodes.text: Fed-Dub Protective Services was an arms manufacturer based on the Corellia system planets of Talus and Tralus. They manufactured the Spukami pocket blaster, a hold-out blaster made for home-defense.

Fed-Dub Protective Services was first mentioned in the 2019 canon Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying game sourcebook Gadgets and Gear. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Fed-Dub Protective Services was first mentioned in Suns of Fortune, a 2014 Fantasy Flight Games sourcebook.
